description: Emperor is a web enabled tool to manipulate and visualize large, high dimensional datasets through ordination plots, which allows the user to quickly compare samples from diverse environments, such as those from healthy subjects and C. difficile patients. Here, we introduce Emperor’s new and improved Python API, which tightly integrates with the scientific Python stack and places a particular emphasis on the Jupyter notebook environment. This integration allows interactive manipulation and visualization of microbiome datasets.
title: Emperor, Interactive Beta diversity Exploration
